subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Arsenal handed Manchester City its first loss of the season yesterday in the English Premier League, 1-0, and Chelsea beat Portsmouth, 1-0, to move into first place.Cesc Fabregas scored in the 80th minute to give Arsenal the victory and Frank Lampard scored in the first half for Chelsea, which has 10 points from four games. Manchester City is second with 9 points, 2 more than Wigan, Liverpool and Arsenal.In other matches, Liverpool beat Sunderland, 2-0; Birminghan won at Derby County, 2-1; Aston Villa defeated Fulham, 2-1; Bolton beat Reading, 3-0; and Wigan drew, 1-1, at West Ham.
